title: 2021 Week 7 Recap -  Duck & Cover Sunday
itunes:title: 2021 Week 7 Recap -  Duck & Cover Sunday
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal recap every game from Week 7 starting with the Bengals win over the Ravens and the Titans destroying the Chiefs. It's time to duck and cover because there were so many blowouts this weekend, it's hard to keep track. The lock. standings are in shambles and so is Dan after the Jets loss.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
